name: Light Harp HD Full Free
description:
Try a completely new, original, fun, exciting and relaxing music and game experience with the sounds of your Laser Harp! Compose your songs or play the music game. Two apps in one! Are you ready for this great music experience? This is the FULL FREE version of the app!

Some features:
* Play Music or Play Game modes.
* High quality harp sounds (3 different sets available).
* 2 different laser sets (5 in the Pro version) and 4 beautiful backgrounds in HD (9 in the Pro version) to use.
* Background music loops to accompany your compositions (additional loops in the Pro version).
* Classic and Level game modes. Two difficulty levels to ensure longevity.
* Music AI to create virtually infinite music compositions for game mode. Each match is new and different!
* Expressly and exclusively designed for the iPad, with a beautiful, immediate and intuitive user interface.
* Beautiful graphic in HD. Try it with the New iPad with Retina!
* Playable for everybody and anybody! Really fun for all ages! Play and dance to the sounds of your laser harp!
* iOS 4 multitasking support. Compatible with iOS5 and the New iPad!
* Support us downloading the PRO version of the app without AD banners! Download it and suggest to your friends.
* Do you have additional features/improvements to suggest for the next update? Just contact us!


*** And have fun making your music compositions! ***

Download also our other Music Applications on App Store, some are FREE!


Thanks for using our products. Feedback is always welcome to: support@dighentis.com
App Store reviews are greatly appreciated, thank you.
